It is our last summer at West Point!  We will sure miss our cadets.  To keep touch with everyone, I've created a ShinyApp (embedded below) that shows the location (and dates) of everyone over the summer training period.

If you'd rather view the app outside the blog, here is the [link](https://dustyturner.shinyapps.io/CadetSummer2019/)

<center>
```{r, echo=FALSE} 
knitr::include_app("https://dustyturner.shinyapps.io/CadetSummer2019/", height = "2000px")
```
</center>
